txt.en: 'What a feast this is! The Farmers Faire is my favourite festival of the year, [placeholder]. I insist upon tasting every food that is offered at the market.\n\n'The problem is, sometimes I sample something rather alarming, and need relief. Will you help me?'

'Ahhhh. That meal really hit the spot, [placeholder]. If you hadn't been there to help me fetch what I needed, I don't think I would be half as content as I am right now. Has anyone ever told you that you're really not a bad sort of [placeholder]?'

Will Whitfoot, Mayor of Michel Delving, is said to be the fattest hobbit in the Westfarthing (and possibly beyond).\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>
You did not bring the mayor what he asked for  ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Bring the mayor something to relieve him ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Items that might help to relieve the mayor's discomfort can be found throughout the Farmers Faire area.\n\nYou should collect an item that will help to soothe the mayor's requests.
Do not bring the mayor the wrong item ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mayor Whitfoot can be found at the Farmers Faire in Bywater.\n\nYou should speak with Mayor Whitfoot.
